name: Little Story of Bali
description:
This work is a short simple illustration of Maharsi Markandeya's journey in spreading Hinduism in Bali. With the background of Mount Agung as a symbol that he and his followers built Besakih Temple at the hillside of Mount Agung.

The dragon figure is an illustration of Naga Basuki, a dragon who is mentioned in folklore as the guardian deity of Mount Agung.
